# 自定义 SVG 图标组件设计

## 图标组件实现方案

根据用户提供的 SVG 文件，我们将创建以下自定义图标组件：

### 1. 首页图标 (HomeIcon)

- 激活状态: `public/icon/home-filled.svg`
- 非激活状态: `public/icon/heart-outline.svg` (注意：用户文档中写的是 heart-outline，但实际应该是 home-outline，这里按照用户提供的文件内容实现)

### 2. 参与图标 (PortfolioIcon)

- 激活状态: `public/icon/portfolio-filled.svg`
- 非激活状态: `public/icon/portfolio-outline.svg`

### 3. 我的图标 (ProfileIcon)

- 激活状态: `public/icon/profile-filled.svg`
- 非激活状态: `public/icon/profile-outline.svg`

## 组件实现方式

我们将使用 React 组件封装这些 SVG 图标，通过 `active` 属性来切换激活和非激活状态。

```jsx
// HomeIcon 组件示例
const HomeIcon = ({ active }: { active: boolean }) => {
  if (active) {
    return (
      <svg width="24" height="25" viewBox="0 0 24 25" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
        <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M4.13269 7.00706C2.79606 7.94271 2 9.47165 2 11.1032V18.4999C2 20.7091 3.79086 22.4999 6 22.4999H18C20.2091 22.4999 22 20.7091 22 18.4999V11.1032C22 9.47165 21.2039 7.94271 19.8673 7.00706L14.2938 3.10564C12.9166 2.14154 11.0834 2.14155 9.70615 3.10564L4.13269 7.00706ZM11.25 18.4999C11.25 18.9099 11.59 19.2499 12 19.2499C12.41 19.2499 12.75 18.9099 12.75 18.4999V15.4999C12.75 15.0899 12.41 14.7499 12 14.7499C11.59 14.7499 11.25 15.0899 11.25 15.4999V18.4999Z" fill="#0078E5"/>
      </svg>
    );
  }
  
  return (
    <svg width="29" height="24" viewBox="0 0 29 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      <path d="M14.3514 5.24712C15.5057 4.15694 16.9607 3.6629 18.4022 3.79107L18.7665 3.83697C19.008 3.87627 19.2473 3.93279 19.4823 4.00689L19.8309 4.13091L19.9012 4.16314C20.2386 4.33805 20.3955 4.74359 20.2528 5.10455C20.1098 5.46569 19.7173 5.65451 19.3514 5.55084L19.2792 5.52642L19.0311 5.43755C18.8644 5.38501 18.6954 5.3451 18.5253 5.31744L18.2694 5.28521C17.271 5.19643 16.2338 5.53131 15.3798 6.33892L15.2118 6.50689C14.9286 6.80441 14.5356 6.97271 14.1249 6.97271C13.7655 6.97264 13.4197 6.84396 13.1493 6.61236L13.0389 6.50689C12.2102 5.63596 11.1832 5.24127 10.1805 5.27349L9.98034 5.28521C8.89152 5.3822 7.80641 5.9893 7.03991 7.13287L6.8905 7.36822C5.65365 9.44838 5.95311 12.2605 7.50964 13.9219L7.66394 14.0782L7.69128 14.1065L7.69323 14.1085C7.69494 14.1103 7.69764 14.1136 7.70104 14.1172C7.708 14.1247 7.71866 14.1359 7.73229 14.1504C7.75987 14.1799 7.80097 14.2236 7.85339 14.2794C7.95835 14.3909 8.11044 14.5514 8.29675 14.7471C8.66971 15.1389 9.18097 15.6703 9.73327 16.2295C10.8647 17.3752 12.0892 18.5553 12.6913 18.9629L12.8739 19.0811C13.2866 19.3383 13.6181 19.4645 13.9061 19.5059C14.2203 19.551 14.5448 19.504 14.9442 19.3194L15.2342 19.168C15.3353 19.1098 15.4414 19.0439 15.5526 18.9688L15.618 18.9288C15.9528 18.7489 16.3762 18.8484 16.5936 19.17C16.8254 19.5132 16.7356 19.9801 16.3925 20.212L16.1874 20.3448C16.0509 20.4305 15.9146 20.5091 15.7782 20.5801L15.5741 20.6807C14.9596 20.9648 14.3421 21.0836 13.6923 20.9903C13.1368 20.9104 12.6071 20.6826 12.078 20.3526L11.8505 20.2051C11.0988 19.6963 9.76022 18.3924 8.66589 17.2842C8.10527 16.7165 7.58698 16.1775 7.20983 15.7813C7.02137 15.5833 6.86728 15.4201 6.76062 15.3067C6.70749 15.2502 6.66586 15.2061 6.63757 15.1758C6.62342 15.1607 6.61271 15.1486 6.60534 15.1407L6.59362 15.129V15.128C4.40012 12.9763 3.99718 9.29968 5.60144 6.60162L5.79479 6.29498C6.79621 4.80297 8.27577 3.93099 9.84753 3.79107L10.1356 3.77447C11.4816 3.73191 12.8208 4.22959 13.8983 5.24712L14.1249 5.47271L14.3514 5.24712Z" fill="#1A1A1A"/>
      <path d="M22.0039 6.98511C23.4479 9.41346 23.0616 12.7253 21.1076 14.6174C21.1076 14.6174 19.4675 16.3762 17.9619 17.8385" stroke="#0078E5" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  );
};
```

## 颜色主题适配

为了适配不同的主题（浅色/深色），我们需要确保图标颜色能够根据主题变化。可以通过 CSS 变量或接收颜色属性来实现。

```jsx
// 支持主题切换的图标组件
const HomeIcon = ({ active, color }: { active: boolean; color?: string }) => {
  const fillColor = color || (active ? 'var(--adm-color-primary)' : 'var(--adm-color-weak)');
  
  if (active) {
    return (
      <svg width="24" height="25" viewBox="0 0 24 25" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
        <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M4.13269 7.00706C2.79606 7.94271 2 9.47165 2 11.1032V18.4999C2 20.7091 3.79086 22.4999 6 22.4999H18C20.2091 22.4999 22 20.7091 22 18.4999V11.1032C22 9.47165 21.2039 7.94271 19.8673 7.00706L14.2938 3.10564C12.9166 2.14154 11.0834 2.14155 9.70615 3.10564L4.13269 7.00706ZM11.25 18.4999C11.25 18.9099 11.59 19.2499 12 19.2499C12.41 19.2499 12.75 18.9099 12.75 18.4999V15.4999C12.75 15.0899 12.41 14.7499 12 14.7499C11.59 14.7499 11.25 15.0899 11.25 15.4999V18.4999Z" fill={fillColor}/>
      </svg>
    );
  }
  
  return (
    <svg width="29" height="24" viewBox="0 0 29 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      <path d="M14.3514 5.24712C15.5057 4.15694 16.9607 3.6629 18.4022 3.79107L18.7665 3.83697C19.008 3.87627 19.2473 3.93279 19.4823 4.00689L19.8309 4.13091L19.9012 4.16314C20.2386 4.33805 20.3955 4.74359 20.2528 5.10455C20.1098 5.46569 19.7173 5.65451 19.3514 5.55084L19.2792 5.52642L19.0311 5.43755C18.8644 5.38501 18.6954 5.3451 18.5253 5.31744L18.2694 5.28521C17.271 5.19643 16.2338 5.53131 15.3798 6.33892L15.2118 6.50689C14.9286 6.80441 14.5356 6.97271 14.1249 6.97271C13.7655 6.97264 13.4197 6.84396 13.1493 6.61236L13.0389 6.50689C12.2102 5.63596 11.1832 5.24127 10.1805 5.27349L9.98034 5.28521C8.89152 5.3822 7.80641 5.9893 7.03991 7.13287L6.8905 7.36822C5.65365 9.44838 5.95311 12.2605 7.50964 13.9219L7.66394 14.0782L7.69128 14.1065L7.69323 14.1085C7.69494 14.1103 7.69764 14.1136 7.70104 14.1172C7.708 14.1247 7.71866 14.1359 7.73229 14.1504C7.75987 14.1799 7.80097 14.2236 7.85339 14.2794C7.95835 14.3909 8.11044 14.5514 8.29675 14.7471C8.66971 15.1389 9.18097 15.6703 9.73327 16.2295C10.8647 17.3752 12.0892 18.5553 12.6913 18.9629L12.8739 19.0811C13.2866 19.3383 13.6181 19.4645 13.9061 19.5059C14.2203 19.551 14.5448 19.504 14.9442 19.3194L15.2342 19.168C15.3353 19.1098 15.4414 19.0439 15.5526 18.9688L15.618 18.9288C15.9528 18.7489 16.3762 18.8484 16.5936 19.17C16.8254 19.5132 16.7356 19.9801 16.3925 20.212L16.1874 20.3448C16.0509 20.4305 15.9146 20.5091 15.7782 20.5801L15.5741 20.6807C14.9596 20.9648 14.3421 21.0836 13.6923 20.9903C13.1368 20.9104 12.6071 20.6826 12.078 20.3526L11.8505 20.2051C11.0988 19.6963 9.76022 18.3924 8.66589 17.2842C8.10527 16.7165 7.58698 16.1775 7.20983 15.7813C7.02137 15.5833 6.86728 15.4201 6.76062 15.3067C6.70749 15.2502 6.66586 15.2061 6.63757 15.1758C6.62342 15.1607 6.61271 15.1486 6.60534 15.1407L6.59362 15.129V15.128C4.40012 12.9763 3.99718 9.29968 5.60144 6.60162L5.79479 6.29498C6.79621 4.80297 8.27577 3.93099 9.84753 3.79107L10.1356 3.77447C11.4816 3.73191 12.8208 4.22959 13.8983 5.24712L14.1249 5.47271L14.3514 5.24712Z" fill={fillColor}/>
      <path d="M22.0039 6.98511C23.4479 9.41346 23.0616 12.7253 21.1076 14.6174C21.1076 14.6174 19.4675 16.3762 17.9619 17.8385" stroke={fillColor} stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  );
};
```

## 组件导出

所有图标组件将被导出，供 BottomNavigation 组件使用。
